# play()

**Instance Method**

Plays the audio resource.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency func play()
```

## Discussion

The controller plays from the beginning of the resource, or from the point at which it was paused if you previously called the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioPlaybackController/pause()] method during playback. The controller ignores calls to [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioPlaybackController/play()] when audio is already playing.

## Starting and stopping audio playback

- **pause()**: Pauses playback of the audio resource while maintaining the position in the audio stream.
- **stop()**: Stops playback of the audio resource and discards the location in the audio stream.
- **isPlaying**: A Boolean value that indicates whether playback is currently active.
